form.title: Let's connect and work together!
form.subTitle: I am an experienced frontend developer with expertise in modern frameworks, specializing in building fast, optimized, and scalable applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript. With a focus on user experience, interactive component development, and clean coding practices, I have crafted efficient and functional user interfaces. By leveraging TypeScript's strict type-checking and Next.js optimization techniques, I aim to deliver modern, high-performing, and secure web experiences that meet users' needs.
